description: AUTO-DISCOVERY: Get all available spatial relations from RELATIONS.json. Returns relations (on_top, stack_on, inside, next_to, etc.), surface positions, and their usage syntax. Pure MOP - reads from Pydantic modals!

returns.relations: object mapping relation names to descriptions and parameters
returns.surface_positions: object mapping position names to (x, y) factors

workflow_hints.when_to_use: After discovering assets and behaviors, learn spatial placement options (on_top, inside, next_to, etc.)

examples.output_summary: Returns 8 spatial relations and 5 surface positions for precise asset placement
examples.use_case: To understand how to position assets relative to each other in scenes

best_practices: Use this to learn proper relation syntax before creating scene scripts
